title: Mundu S.C.
text:
Mundu SC is a <a href="Zanzibar">Zanzibar</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Nungwi">Nungwi</a> near <a href="Unguja">Unguja</a> in <a href="East%20Africa">East Africa</a>.
The club is one of the three biggest football clubs in <a href="Unguja">Unguja</a>.
Currently the team competes in the <a href="Zanzibar%20Premier%20League">Zanzibar Premier League</a>.
The club competed in the <a href="CAF%20Confederation%20Cup">CAF Confederation Cup</a> for the first time in 2007.
Stadium.
Currently the team plays at the 5000 capacity <a href="Unguja%20Park">Unguja Park</a>.
